column3: “I have had this strain on many occasions and I must say it always is amazing and excellent probably my top go to strain as well as GDP the flavor will hit your mouth like a rush of blueberry muffins and the effects hit immediately! I have done a little research on this strain and it seems to be stuff of legend DJ short himself seems to me wanted to perfect the blueberry strain and I believe he did! I use this strain ...”
“This strain made me feel good,happy. made me want to get up and do something. AND i did! i deep cleaned and stuffed my face:) defiantly one of my top 5!!”

“I'm an Indica fan girl, for good reason. I have MS, osteoarthritis and migraines/TMJ pain...normally I use Blue Alien or Skywalker for my nightly meds, but they were out so I was recommended DJSB, this is my new favorite Indica. It's a creeper for sure. After 10 minutes complete bliss, no tension in my muscles, bone pain not felt, and then you peacefully drift to sleep. Best sleep I've had in months! It's such a swee...”

“Wow... Wasn't expecting such a high like this delivered. I smoke very heavy THC buds, and this hits just as hard and lasts even longer. Roll her up in a joint, you get that sweet aroma of blueberries and pine. Mhhhhmmm. Wish I had more now. Give it try, might even shock you!”

“if you're reviewing DJ SHORT blueberry  and the bud doesn't absolutely smell deliciously salivating of fruitiness then you don't have the real DJ short blueberry. The buds keep for a long time and keep their odor longer!!”

“Bed time, Folks...I review many sativas or sativa dom hybrids because I like to remain active while medicating my ailments. An important part of healing is a good night of restful sleep. I was fortunate and found some very well cultivated and manicured Dj Short Blueberry. In Sacramento, I'm seeing some of the finest expressions of the more popular varietals and the herb I picked up is an example of just that. Sweet b...”

“This strain gave me the most mellow high that i've ever had. I just felt relaxed and i didn't feel anxious or worrisome. I would totally suggest this strain for patients who suffer from anxiety or depression. This strain has definitely helped my condition.”

“I picked this up yesterday at Urban Greenhouse in Phoenix. As soon as I smelled it, I knew I would love it. It smells very strongly of blueberries; mmm so good!! After I took my first hit I fell in love. The high was very euphoric, made me so happy, and I just wanted to DO something. It stimulated my mind but sedated my body. One of the best strains I've tried! Definitely will buy again!!”

“DJ Short did a good job with this one!  A mellow indica, with an overall euphoric relaxing high.  Long lasting, without the crash and burn that some stronger indicas have.  Super tastiness - if only real blue berries smelled this dank!”

“Euphoria without paranoia. Real blueberry smell and taste. Blue and red colored buds. Maybe luck, or maybe the years of testing and breeding DJ Short carried out. Toked many strains, this is still my favorite. I use Flo for a clear(er) day. Similar genetics. Also bred by DJ Short.”

“Migraine pain 5; nausea 8 when I medicated round 2230 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (an absolute for me). Body high eased me into a peaceful sleep. Not too heavy hitting; dint immediately pass out which was nice. :-) Head high, well, I think I just said it. I was pretty damn stoned but not @ all overwhelming. Tastes sweet like blueberries. Highly recommend for nigh...”

“At around 9:00 pm I took a half-bowl rip of this fruity strain. A few minutes after inhalation, I began feeling very relaxed. It felt like I was the worlds softest, most relaxed cat being held in the arms of an even softer cat. Shortly after drifting through this comfortable high, I went down stairs and melted into the blankets of my bed. I slept beautifully. Thank you, Dsb.”

“let me just say im blowin dj right now. like tony the tiger said.......    'they r great'........



    lol, I like the body high of dj. this is my 4 or 5th time playin with it and it does its job.”
“Happy, clear stoney, hungry, thoughtful, uplifting, comforting, creative, bit spacey but still attentive. Quite strong but easy to smoke too much to get that oomph.”
“i was floating and  i jus enjoyed the heady high until the couch turned into my bed”

“Does wonders for my anxiety and depression. Sweet, mellow, comforting high. I'm sleepy but can stay awake and do projects (e.g. this review if I want, which is nice.
Really surprised how much I like this, because I haven't had much luck with indicas. Even the beloved Granddaddy Purple and Northern Lights made me feel depressed and anxious and unable to sleep because of obsessive, recursive thinking about life problem...”
“i was floating and  i jus enjoyed the heady high until the couch turned into my bed”
“Happy, clear stoney, hungry, thoughtful, uplifting, comforting, creative, bit spacey but still attentive. Quite strong but easy to smoke too much to get that oomph.”

“Pretty awesome stuff. however I'll just say this,
major dry mouth, I seem to lose my balance or something because I run into shit lmao. and deep thought. 
for example, I killed a moth and then started getting into deep thought about what that moth could have been think before it died. lmao”
“This was the second time I have had this strain. I was pleased with the appearance and flavor.”
“One of my favorites, the terpenes are amazing. I definitely recommend trying this one.”

“This review is actually for Blueberry Jack from Natural Selections (of Peoria). Which is DJ short blueberry x Jack Herer. 
Very interesting and nice. I love Herer and it certainly mingles well with this blueberry. You can feel both relaxed and alert at the same time. Great for my anxiety. I'd recommend this after a hard day. It doesn't put me to sleep but it sure it great for chillin. I like it!”
“thc content was off the charts and the whole inside of nugs are completely purple with lime green cylaxes. this is a stinky compact 1/8 nug that is almost a shame to smoke, but im gunna :,)”

“This mostly Indica plant grows really fast. It is quick to finish, 6-7 weeks. Easy to manicure. Great for SOG. Dense, compact buds. Close internodal spacing. This strain has a nice berry and spice flavor and aroma. It really hits hard behind the eyes. The pressure gets so intense, I have to go to sleep to relieve it. I use it mostly for PMS and as a night time smoke.”

“A creeper indeed!
For the first part, it makes you wonder why it's listed as an Indica, not much of a body high sets in, your eyes and head feel lightly buzzed and shoulders begin to drop, relax...
but then it hits ya!
Defiantly a strain that you could smoke as you finish doing something physically draining/exhausting.
Gives you a good 5-10 minutes to finish up and relax/enjoy the the next couple hours!
Smell is more...”
“thc content was off the charts and the whole inside of nugs are completely purple with lime green cylaxes. this is a stinky compact 1/8 nug that is almost a shame to smoke, but im gunna :,)”

“This mostly Indica plant grows really fast. It is quick to finish, 6-7 weeks. Easy to manicure. Great for SOG. Dense, compact buds. Close internodal spacing. This strain has a nice berry and spice flavor and aroma. It really hits hard behind the eyes. The pressure gets so intense, I have to go to sleep to relieve it. I use it mostly for PMS and as a night time smoke.”
“appetite has returned and pain is slipping away....also taste just like it smells amazing.”

“This is my go-to Indica strain. It gives me a great body high and an overall feeling of happiness and peacefulness. It's also great for before bed because of how sedating and mellowing it is. I absolutely love this strain.”
“uncontrollable laughter for the past 15 minutes”
“Got in the shower with my hat on. Which also means I put it BACK on my head. It's good”
“This strain was very well rounded and an excellent grow of which I acquired.  Not too couch lock, but euphoric and long lasting enough to balance the energy it lets you keep.”

“Generally, DSB is so relaxing on the body aches, muscle cramps and relaxing on the mind. I use it for deep Couch City and deep sleep follows. Yesterday I got a wild hair and decided to puff around 9am. The typical attributes were there especially the full body melt I admire. I will say that the morning session lended some highly noticeable yet subtle effects. For one I definitely noticed more of the Thai influences w...”

“the man himself dj short, believe me or not but my father worked with this man in the 1070s. for those that don't know who dj short is he is a legendary seed breeder from the 70s through the 90's" but dj short made this flower in hopes that ppl would believe that he was the ORIGINAL maker of the blueberry bud. this flower is a great indica.”"

“A few minutes after taking a bong rip of this delicious strain, and I felt like I was in the soft arms of a giant, comfortable cat being pet to a purrrr. This strain is the epitome of relaxation. Great to smoke, relax and maybe hit the bed early.”

“Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog the Aging Ent's Tastings -- Brand: Dama Strain: DJ Short Blueberry Indica-dominant Hybrid -- Potency Analysis: TTL 20% THC 1% CBD 0% THCA 19% -- Cost: $15/gram -- It has a real fruity kind of pot smell and very delicious. The crystals are deep, all over. -- The smoke is big and bold, with serious blueberry flavor. On the inhale, exhale...”
“Words can't describe.  Compliments anything, amazing on its own, and makes great badder.  Was lucky enough to try some. Perfect for anything!! Thank you, DJ Short!!!!”
“Beautiful. Delicious. Mostly sativa effect.”

“DJ Short Blueberry from Dama has become a staple for me - especially as a night cap - and it puts me to sleep every time. Its a beautiful thing how well it works! Tastes like blueberrys and at 26% THC, it packs a subtle punch. If you are looking for an energetic high, this will disappoint. Get it if you want a solid Indica with a great flavor and super chill effects.”

“GeeshBrosWA are lucky to have a stretch indica pheno that is awesome and recently found out we are possession of a rare pheno that is the sativa pheno! Both are sacrilegious and we are honored to carry on such a glorious plant. Both  are MVP caliber, oscar worthy, cy young winners. It helps to have a skilled master bringing each the love and nurturing hand along the way. DJ Short blueberry is the essence of what true...”

“Had the fraction extraction brand concentrate of this, was a heady feel that also made my body feel relaxed and my limbs felt heavy, a solid night med.  it also gave me blurry vision and dry mouth.  Amazing taste for sure.”
“would get again”
“Beautiful. Delicious. Mostly sativa effect.”

“All I can say is WoW. The smell is amazing .The taste is even better.  But the high will wreck you even left me a little dizzy after some bong rips topped with NYC Diesel wax .Thanks to the Swells Farmacy for suggestion.”
“Smaller bright green buds, good crystal content, with red hairs.  Had a slight fruity smell, but not taste.  A great strain still and worth trying.”

“the man himself dj short, believe me or not but my father worked with this man in the 1070s. for those that don't know who dj short is he is a legendary seed breeder from the 70s through the 90's" but dj short made this flower in hopes that ppl would believe that he was the ORIGINAL maker of the blueberry bud. this flower is a great indica.”"

“Anyone that still uses Xanax and wants out, you should try this strain. Caught me off gaurd but in a good way. I felt instant relaxation along with a slight uptake in hunger. Keep some water around, cotton mouth was real. Dosing really matters with this one so watch out first-timers.”

“A few minutes after taking a bong rip of this delicious strain, and I felt like I was in the soft arms of a giant, comfortable cat being pet to a purrrr. This strain is the epitome of relaxation. Great to smoke, relax and maybe hit the bed early.”

“Got this at Old Toby in Chehalis, WA. See pictures and detailed reviews on my blog the Aging Ent's Tastings -- Brand: Dama Strain: DJ Short Blueberry Indica-dominant Hybrid -- Potency Analysis: TTL 20% THC 1% CBD 0% THCA 19% -- Cost: $15/gram -- It has a real fruity kind of pot smell and very delicious. The crystals are deep, all over. -- The smoke is big and bold, with serious blueberry flavor. On the inhale, exhale...”

Yesterday I got a wild hair and decided to puff around 9am. The typical attributes were there especially the full body melt I admire. I will say that the morning session lended some highly noticeable yet subtle effects. For one I definitely noticed more of the Thai influences w...”

“The Look: These Buds look like pale mint green moon rocks they are so dank! Very much like a a really washed out white sandy color I have never seen something so white before very interesting.
The Structure: It has a nice domed rounded top to the calyxes, these rocket nugs are fat a little curled over like being hunched over if it were to sit-up straight, very few hairs but loaded with Terpene crystals!
The Smell: Ve...”
“excellent pain KILLER”

“GeeshBrosWA are lucky to have a stretch indica pheno that is awesome and recently found out we are possession of a rare pheno that is the sativa pheno! Both are sacrilegious and we are honored to carry on such a glorious plant. Both  are MVP caliber, oscar worthy, cy young winners. It helps to have a skilled master bringing each the love and nurturing hand along the way. DJ Short blueberry is the essence of what true...”
“Words can't describe.  Compliments anything, amazing on its own, and makes great badder.  Was lucky enough to try some. Perfect for anything!! Thank you, DJ Short!!!!”
“appetite has returned and pain is slipping away....also taste just like it smells amazing.”
“Smaller bright green buds, good crystal content, with red hairs.  Had a slight fruity smell, but not taste.  A great strain still and worth trying.”
“appetite has returned and pain is slipping away....also taste just like it smells amazing.”

The Smell: Ve...”
“uncontrollable laughter for the past 15 minutes”

“I'm not much of an Indica person. I like euphoria paired with ability and productivity more than the brain-buffer sleepiness many Indica strains provide me. However, we all have our Sofa-Staycations and when I am in that mood, DSB is a very fine choice. 
This strain provides me with a nice euphoric overtone that balances nicely on top of the comfortable body buzz that also accompanies this experience. It's a little l...”

“GeeshBrosWA are lucky to have a stretch indica pheno that is awesome and recently found out we are possession of a rare pheno that is the sativa pheno! Both are sacrilegious and we are honored to carry on such a glorious plant. Both  are MVP caliber, oscar worthy, cy young winners. It helps to have a skilled master bringing each the love and nurturing hand along the way. DJ Short blueberry is the essence of what true...”
“Beautiful. Delicious. Mostly sativa effect.”
“Relaxing and sensation enhancing. Helps with insomnia, not an appetite stimulant.”

The Structure: It has a nice domed rounded top to the calyxes, these rocket nugs are fat a little curled over like being hunched over if it were to sit-up straight, very few hairs but loaded with Terpene crystals!
The Smell: Ve...”

“I am a medical user and this is one of the first strains I tried and is still one of my top three favorites for anytime use.  The smell is amazingly light and sweet, nothing like you would typically associate with the stereotype MJ smell of skunks BO from high school weed back in the day, haha.

I now have found I prefer edibles, cannaoil (made with coconut oil works best for me) but first tried it in a Raw organic c...”
“Excellent flavor and smokability. Works well for everything except going to sleep. I would recommend this to anyone with PTSD or anxiety. Great pain reliever.”
“Smaller bright green buds, good crystal content, with red hairs.  Had a slight fruity smell, but not taste.  A great strain still and worth trying.”
“Words can't describe.  Compliments anything, amazing on its own, and makes great badder.  Was lucky enough to try some. Perfect for anything!! Thank you, DJ Short!!!!”
“Relaxing and sensation enhancing. Helps with insomnia, not an appetite stimulant.”

“All I can say is WoW. The smell is amazing .The taste is even better.  But the high will wreck you even left me a little dizzy after some bong rips topped with NYC Diesel wax .Thanks to the Swells Farmacy for suggestion.”

“The smell is amazing. Everytime I open that glass jar,  I feel like I'm walking thru a blueberry field for sure. This strain can be consumed in both day time and nigh time use. It's not the strongest strain out there but 1 of my top 10 most favorite. Also a great strain for summertime use. Peace....”
“Intense body high but clear headed. Great for pain and anxiety.”

“I can only review this based on PuraEarth DJ Short Uncut Cartridge! I love this bad boy. Def. hits hard first couple pulls. Heavy asf if you puff too long but I love the feelings you gets- just cool vibes.”
“Very nice strain. Defenitely indica. Great flavor and effects. Body high long lasting and pleasant.”

“I got some from a dispensary new to the area. I have to say it is has become one to remember. I took a few good rips and stood in front of the fridge for 30 minutes before opening it then another 30 minutes of staring, now I've eaten I can do this.”

“good smell taste and color
every bit i enjoyed
i was so hungry after a few bowls
then wanted to clean”
“love the taste and smell”
“This is a very fun strain that drifts you off into sleep as you giggle away. Everything yes.”

“Nice job Einstein Buds!! 
Met up with Ms C last weekend. Very happy with the sugges of DJ Very smooth, tasty indica hybrid a Favorite of mine  since trying. This helped with my back pain. Let me relax and unwind. was able to sleep sound after hours after medicating. Really enjoyed the blueberry taste along with the sweet skunk as well. Makes for a perfect marriage in this awesome hybrid DJ Short blueberry. The buds ...”
“Tingly for sure! Amp’d hearing with a buzz. Laid back euphoria. Tip of the tongue is slightly numb”
“This was definitely a super chill strain. It tasted great, it hit hard and made me relaxed. Great for relieving stress and anxiety.”

“I've had a hell of a day. I picked up a gram of this and wow, I feel like things are going to be okay now. This strain has a very potent blueberry scent and it tastes like blueberries. It is a very smooth smoke. This was definitely a creeper and it left me feeling physically relaxed with a derpy smile on my face.”

“Came to me as DJ’s Blueberry. 13.47%thc & 1.02 %cbd.  Very relaxing, it gave me the giggles (rare for me).
Enjoyed the look & taste of  the flower. Large white crystals made these medium sized sativa nugs stand out”
“Great day time strain! I tried this both vaporized and smoked. Stress and anxiety reliever. Clear thinking. No couch lock. Music and video games are great.”
“I smoke a lot and very rarely does a strain get me hungry. This indica heavy cross makes me MUNCH!!”
“As someone who is naturally tense. I find this strain to be a non-paranoid, relaxing, happy high that is both tasty & potent as far as flowers goes. 🤙🤓👾 #420Buddy”

“Very relaxing strain that is perfect for taking the edge off or watching TV.  No real downside to this stuff except you can end up smoking a lot of it and it has seeds. One of my absolute favorites. Lost a star cause seeds, don't let that put you off.”
“A little bit goes a long way! Smoked a regular cone joint of this and was D O N E for the night. Good restful sleep though. <3”
“Amazing feel , great body relaxer”

“Hey guys, I gotta say, this strain is special, just as the description said. I was fortunate to recieve a clone last spring, and man, was it an experience. The plant will teach you so many skills, and is incredibly versatile when it comes to stress training. However, the smoke, is what is shredder. Terpenes from flower unparalleled in nature, with a sweet, tropical, blueberry esque aroma. The high is as lit as the fl...”
“A little bit goes a long way! Smoked a regular cone joint of this and was D O N E for the night. Good restful sleep though. <3”
“this bud was killer I smoke two bowls and was faded”

“Hey guys, I gotta say, this strain is special, just as the description said. I was fortunate to recieve a clone last spring, and man, was it an experience. The plant will teach you so many skills, and is incredibly versatile when it comes to stress training. However, the smoke, is what is shredder. Terpenes from flower unparalleled in nature, with a sweet, tropical, blueberry esque aroma. The high is as lit as the fl...”

“This is by far one of my top favorites. First of all, the smell is of the most sweet pungent grapey-blueberry. The flower is beautiful! a rich violet at the root which ombres to a bright lime green. Such a lovely strain:)”
“Very tasty. Head high to the max but mellow. #420sweepsteaks”
“I'm in love with DJ Short's Blueberry. It's the original rendition of the blueberry" strain and of course; the best. There are few strains which I think actually live up to their hype
column4: and this is one that does that and much more; parenting an endless line of Blueberry crosses with its strong genetic material as their backbones.”"

column3: “Easily one of the best teasing buds I've ever had it smelled and looked phenomenal was extremely impressed as it tasted so well and put me in a relaxed chilled state but was well converted with a friend”
“I'm a big Indica Fan Boy, and I was not let down with this strain. I  was looking for something to help with insomnia and with my hunger, and was not let down.”
“Very nice indica, I wasn't wowed" by it but it has helped with my sleep and overall comfort level.”"
“whst I always do about GeeshzWA blueberry bud from DJ Short...perfection...like a Monet...gentle mind invigoration, body melt, relaxation...sleeep”
“The strain  is perfect.”

“High 7/10
Taste 8/10”
“Great for falling asleep”

“In a tincture; slow onset, mild but pleasing effects.  Just sort of took the edges off of my environment and the folk therein.  Dreamy if left alone, but conversational when the topic is of interest.”
“fucking bomb”
“my favorite”
“s Amazon. smell look. and omg it helps with so much for me.”

“This strain hit me like a horse tranquilizer. 

Heavy body and head stone made me feel like a jellyfish.  Great strain for sleep and relaxing.

THE hard hitting Blueberry you want to bring home to mom for the holidaze.”
“Easily one of the best strains I’ve smoked definitely lives up to the legends!”
“This review actually pertains to a dj short blueberry sativa strain that outdates the indica version.”

“Nice if you're trying to get to know your bud, but I wouldn't rely on this as a daily driver. Maybe like good for a movie or video games. Mostly got cloudy, flat couch lock highs followed by some decent munchies a long while later--and then feeling kind of all over the place. Not much to remark on in terms of flavor for me, esp compared to cookies and muffins. It's alright. I'm glad it's around, very generous strain.”
“A very mellow, stable high that consistently lasts a couple hours. Its floaty and not too heady and inspires incredible creativity.”

“this strain is truly on point. it is a great great med strain. my brother grow 3 plants of the strain and it doesn't disapoint. it does come at you very well with each hit. I broke it down to an Irish butter and it came out awesome. great feeling for about 5 hrs a table spoon. I love my DSB!!!!”
“Amazing feel , great body relaxer”

“Really mellow full body high. I’ve used vape cartridges and flower. Both rock. 
I’ve got moderately-severe peripheral neuropathy and this really helps to deaden my pain.”
“I'm a big Indica Fan Boy, and I was not let down with this strain. I  was looking for something to help with insomnia and with my hunger, and was not let down.”
“A little bit goes a long way! Smoked a regular cone joint of this and was D O N E for the night. Good restful sleep though. <3”

“Came to me as DJ’s Blueberry. 13.47%thc & 1.02 %cbd.  Very relaxing, it gave me the giggles (rare for me).
Enjoyed the look & taste of  the flower. Large white crystals made these medium sized sativa nugs stand out”
“This is a very fun strain that drifts you off into sleep as you giggle away. Everything yes.”

“I got some from a dispensary new to the area. I have to say it is has become one to remember. I took a few good rips and stood in front of the fridge for 30 minutes before opening it then another 30 minutes of staring, now I've eaten I can do this.”

“Wow, this strain is incredible!  Quite literally, the 1st indica I have ever loved. If you are more of a sativa/hybrid fan, this is a great indica strain to try.  First of all, the flavor is Ah-mazing...I felt like I was smoking a blueberry muffin. Secondly, it is VERY potent...I am a fairly heavy smoker, and I only needed 2-3 puffs of this to become nicely baked...just the perfect amount. Which kind of offsets the h...”
“The flavor really is only second to the high. Dabbing this in a puffco peak.  I'm a indica fan and this is in my top 5.”

“I'm...euphoric, relaxed, content, focused...holy cow man. Great for depression, anxiety, and muscle tension. I've had this strain from 2 different growers and they've both been quite impressive. Great stuff. I'm so happy!”

“I can only review this based on PuraEarth DJ Short Uncut Cartridge! I love this bad boy. Def. hits hard first couple pulls. Heavy asf if you puff too long but I love the feelings you gets- just cool vibes.”
“Omg that was some FIRE ... one of the best I’ve had in a long minute had me coughing up my lungs ...    HAD A MIGRAINE THAT HAD ME DISCOMBOBULATED . Shuuuu just had to GET HIGHLY MEDICATED ..”

“DJ Short Blueberry makes me happy and puts a smile on my face. My body has pleasant tingling sensations and feels warm (not in the temperature sense). I like to dance, but have to stop as it messes with my balance a little. I easily laugh at jokes I’ve heard before.

When I play games, it makes it more vivid: looking at Skyrim’s environment is so enjoyable. However I played horror games, which was just a terrible ide...”
“hits like a truck, but when the high is over, it ends quickly”

“In 2002 I brought the first generation of DJ Short feminized seeds back from Amsterdam, purchased from Paradise Seed Co. VERY expensive ($320 American/10 seeds).

Unfortunately, the original feminized generation wasn't genetically stable. I read in several magazines about others having similar issues. However, I was still able to grow three plants out. 

Blueish-green in color, and very frosty, with super-dense hard ...”
“Simply what all other indica's are compared to............... A classic- never grows old, dense trippy sleepy tasty - personal stash............ aloha”
“Super resilient awesome strain to grow the smell is insanely sweet super fruity I would recommend you grow this strain.”
“This stuff is great for the little kick of energy, then a nice relaxed state amd finally sleep!”

“Very relaxing strain that is perfect for taking the edge off or watching TV.  No real downside to this stuff except you can end up smoking a lot of it and it has seeds. One of my absolute favorites. Lost a star cause seeds, don't let that put you off.”
“Great day time strain! I tried this both vaporized and smoked. Stress and anxiety reliever. Clear thinking. No couch lock. Music and video games are great.”

“I've had a hell of a day. I picked up a gram of this and wow, I feel like things are going to be okay now. This strain has a very potent blueberry scent and it tastes like blueberries. It is a very smooth smoke. This was definitely a creeper and it left me feeling physically relaxed with a derpy smile on my face.”
“This was definitely a super chill strain. It tasted great, it hit hard and made me relaxed. Great for relieving stress and anxiety.”
“Tingly for sure! Amp’d hearing with a buzz. Laid back euphoria. Tip of the tongue is slightly numb”

“Nice job Einstein Buds!! 
Met up with Ms C last weekend. Very happy with the sugges of DJ Very smooth, tasty indica hybrid a Favorite of mine  since trying. This helped with my back pain. Let me relax and unwind. was able to sleep sound after hours after medicating. Really enjoyed the blueberry taste along with the sweet skunk as well. Makes for a perfect marriage in this awesome hybrid DJ Short blueberry. The buds ...”
“love the taste and smell”

“good smell taste and color
every bit i enjoyed
i was so hungry after a few bowls
then wanted to clean”
“Very nice strain. Defenitely indica. Great flavor and effects. Body high long lasting and pleasant.”
“Mmm Mmmmm good can never go wrong with this strain..”

“So have a bit of this and decided to use it in a 7th floor Silver Surfer vaporizer. this stuff is strong and will last a long while. Bringing in the vapor the berry flavor is very noticeable. like the smell of a berry patch in late spring. Taking just a small amount the effects started to take affect. Did not lose to much mental focus but it was noticeable. Body just felt like it was floating everywhere I went. On th...”

“I love this strain. I usually keep at least 6-10 different strains and DJ shorts blueberry is my favorite. It smells and taste great all the way to the end. The effects are immediate. Definitely indica. It can be used for day or night. If u love to smoke but have to be careful due to panic attacks I recommend this strain. Keeps u calm and relaxed not jumpy or noid.”

“Delicious flavour and aroma. Obviously strong berry flavours but also a bit of Thai basil towards the end of a bowl. The buzz is gorgeous... Clear as a bell in the head, whilst the body is buzzed to the tips of your toes. Possibly considered to be a little old fashioned these days amongst the plethora of kushes, but this old skool indica is still an absolute gem. Gourmet shit right here.”
“Great strain taste good great for muscle tension, sour musle and pain ect.. Smooth potent effect awesome stuff”
“amazing for pain and relaxing”
“This indica is works exactly how I want it to. It knocks me out quick even with anxiety and insomnia. It has a lively blueberry taste and smell. 5 stars all the way!”
“Thank the flower Gods for this head-to-toe indica.”

“I was not aware of the legendary status of DSB when I got a good smell of it. It was so good at I had to have some. I made a fair donation for the Quarter(50). I loved the sweetness and quality of bud. I definitely would recommend it. If I find it again I will give it the legendary respect it deserves.”
“excellent”
“this is the best strain in my area I use it for medical reasons I live in nys we have a crappy medical Marijuana law that goes into effect in January”

“Tucker McElroy, lead singer and driver of the Winnebago here. 

What a great smelling flower. This is the only blueberry strain I have sampled that actually smelled like blueberry. The high was nice and mellow before I finally fell asleep. Grown by Fruit of the Root.”

“Wow!  Picked an 1/8th of this up at Oasis Cannabis Superstore on sale for $25.  Great deal...great smoke.  The bag appeal wasn't anything to brag about when I looked it over.  The buds were on the smallish side and not very dense or colorful for that matter.  The aroma was a different matter though and that is the main reason I ended up purchasing some.  To be honest I wasn't expecting a lot but found it hard to pass...”
“Talk about a smell like no others. Well, if you get the real DJ BB, you'll know. Heavy heavy heavy high, even though I am backwards to the normal. This indica put me right out.”
“Chill mood.”
“Good stuff mixed with purple sour and made it even better”

“Bought one huge bud gram and smoked half about three hours before bed.  The wonderful blueberry smell did transfer, even if slightly, to the smoke flavor.  The body high was great and had me with that tingly" feeling that good indica strains do. After the two hour high I slept like a baby and woke up feeling great and ready to rock and roll.”"
“little pricy but good”

“Easily one of the best teasing buds I've ever had it smelled and looked phenomenal was extremely impressed as it tasted so well and put me in a relaxed chilled state but was well converted with a friend”
“Very tasty. Head high to the max but mellow. #420sweepsteaks”

“Hey guys, I gotta say, this strain is special, just as the description said. I was fortunate to recieve a clone last spring, and man, was it an experience. The plant will teach you so many skills, and is incredibly versatile when it comes to stress training. However, the smoke, is what is shredder. Terpenes from flower unparalleled in nature, with a sweet, tropical, blueberry esque aroma. The high is as lit as the fl...”
“As someone who is naturally tense. I find this strain to be a non-paranoid, relaxing, happy high that is both tasty & potent as far as flowers goes. 🤙🤓👾 #420Buddy”
“I smoke a lot and very rarely does a strain get me hungry. This indica heavy cross makes me MUNCH!!”

“Blueberry is a mostly indica hybrid that provides a pleasant and long-lasting high when smoked. This marijuana has a sweet fruity smell and tastes like blueberries with a slight sweetness.  Heavier sedating buzz.”

“This is by far one of my top favorites. First of all, the smell is of the most sweet pungent grapey-blueberry. The flower is beautiful! a rich violet at the root which ombres to a bright lime green. Such a lovely strain:)”

“Fresh and fragrant, this flower leaves a subtle fruitiness taste. I would recommend using small snappers in a bong, as the buds are tight, the flavor looses it's potency in a pipe. Overall a good time to be had. I would also recommend watching an old cartoon or playing an old NES game, the high is nostalgic.”
“I'm in love with DJ Short's Blueberry. It's the original rendition of the blueberry" strain and of course; the best. There are few strains which I think actually live up to their hype
column4: and this is one that does that and much more; parenting an endless line of Blueberry crosses with its strong genetic material as their backbones.”"

column3: “By far my favorite indica.  Super relaxing, sleep inducing high that I need. Always keep some of this on hand.”
“this bud was killer I smoke two bowls and was faded”
“Great for passing out. if you have insomnia, definitely try this strain. taste is pretty good too.”
“Didnt look like the picture at all but was still nice bud, smoked clean, and very enjoyable.”

“First review, so here it goes. Picked up an 1/8 from Rocky Road Remedies in Vail. Buds were small pale green and smelled strongly of fruity pebbles. Lit it up in the bowl and blueberry was the dominant note. Also pine, sage, and vanilla. Slight harshness in the back of the throat on large hits. The high is body relaxing, but almost a bit of a cerebral high as well. This def wasn't a couch melder. But it sure did make...”
“always a great strain.”
“Very good relaxing and delicious tasting buds, love smoking this strain in the late evenings.”
“Awesome...Deep Couch City”
“very tasty. very indica.  very smooth. very recommended”
“This is my absolute favorite strain!! I love the fruity flavor and the mellow head buzz. Perfect for relaxing at the end of the day.”
“Smooth Hit, Happy High, and Relaxing Relax”
“Great all around strain good for lazy days and night time relaxing.”

“The taste is amazing, and the high feels wonderful!  The bowl I'm smoking out of looks like a dew-covered sub-tropical forest in bloom, the rising sun glinting off of a waterfall.  The longer I stare into it, the more I feel like I'm sitting there on the edge of the water.  The first rays of the sun carress my skin, hitting the dew on the plants and setting them aglitter with gold.  It's a very warm and relaxing weed...”
“Got this stuff called blue berry punch, i heard its a cross between Dj Short Blueberry x Romulan”
“my personal favorite. one word, PERFECT”
“Very good strain definitely recommend it. Had a fruity flavor and very uplifting and long lasting effects.”
“amazing for pain and relaxing”
“Super duper awesome”
“Good for pain excellent stuff en otras palabras esta chingona saborsito rico y potente pa quitarte el sombrero y gritar AHUA 🌵”

“increases my apitite.  not to heavy high, you can still function for indica , but it is definitely a euphoric high.  it is a uplifting strain and will put you in a happy mood.  it smells,  taste very good too.  my buds we're sticky and yummy too.”
“One of the smooothest smokes we have ever been blessed with! We have the Pre '07 DJ's cut and its really hard to stop from smoking the entire bag!”
“really tasty,nice size nuggs”

“I may up this rating but overall I give it a 3.5, at least the Dama grown stuff I picked up today (I really don't like their blister-wrap packaging by the way) - it was rather fluffy overall for this price. The Blueberry aroma was really, really muted - not what I remember the true" Blueberry to be at all. I was expecting a lot
column4: given the reason this strain exists
column5: because the old Blueberry *was* "a lot" - a lot of ...”"

column3: “smoooth”

“I sampled DJ Short's Blueberry by The Highpoint Reserve.  Testing at 24% THC-A, Sold at Commencement Bay Cannabis. I bought a  Single gram to try, and instantly went back for the 3.5g for $28. This stuff smell just like blueberries, more than any other single weed I have smoked. On the exhale it tastes just like blueberry pancakes. It provides a nice relaxing high. It's a very functional Indica.”
“Nice mellow ride. Smells great, thanks for hooking me up Urban Greenhouse!”
“Bomb”

“Sweet, fruity, nice and strong is how this blueberry strain from the great American breeder from the 70s. Fantastic for insomnia and pain, will make it virtually nil! Great flavor, high and all around classic strain. I give this 5 out of 5 pillows for a great nights sleep!”
“this shit took to the moon and tasted of sweet berry”

“I had some grown by Dama.  It was very potent and would make me anxious if I had too much, which was easy to do.  It had a nice flavor and when I had the right amount it would be a nice 3-4 hour high.”

“First impression upon opening container = magical blueberry funk engulfs your nose 

It's smooth, pungent, and dusted beautifully. It delightfully fulfills my desired state swiftly.”
“Such a great strain. Not only does it taste delicious,  it works great for my back pain and putting me to sleep.”
“The blueberry ness is heavy and the strain is dank, some of the best we've ever seen let alone smoked.”
“Picked up an 1/8 just to try. Loved it it really helped me relax. Having anxiety and depression it worked great. Also helped tremendously with back pain. Definitely a keeper in the arsenal.”
“This was a good put you to bed" strain.  Doesn't 'put' you to sleep
column4: but you just want to get comfortable
column6: cuddle up with lots of blankets
column7: and watch tv in bed then pass out later.  I don't remember this helping me with any type of pain.  It did put a cold sensation in my entire body though
column8: like I felt cold inside.  I had 1/2 a bowl and it tasted like sweet pine

column3: “this strain is fire.  taste is great Buds were nice and dense.  smells and taste sweet on the exhale.  the high was great kept my pain relieved without knocking me out.  I would buy this again.”
“calm head and body high, good for sleep and relaxation”
“Very tasty, I would recommend this strain to others with minor cramping anywhere in your body.”

“The Wandering GoAts DJ Short Blueberry is super smelly.. One of the most stankiest Blueberry that actually smells like blueberry. The THC level was just over 27 % so the high will knock you out . It's the perfect strain for night time smoke when you feel like having something tasty..”
“This did nothing for me. Very light/bland body buzz... Waste of time and money, not strong at all.”

“🍇 this strain is berry good! Okay, in all seriousness now that I got that pun out of the way; this came as a 500 mg distillate cartridge from Pura Earth.
First off the high is quite heavy and heady. It was a concentrate an advertised between 75 + 85% THC. The flavor was blueberry like almost too much blueberry for me, I like a little gas in mine. This tasted like some super blueberry from outer space that left me me...”

“it smells great and had a really nice flavor but the buds are extremely stringy with tons of stem and very poorly manicured. low medicinal effect. would not buy again or recommend purchasing. very disappointed.”

“Dj Short Blueberry

Another amazing Vegan Status Organically Grown Strain.

Beautiful Light Colored Buds with a sweet fresh juicy scent

and a perfect bright calming high..”

“Dama Dj short is maybe a 2 star...blueberry smell and flavor are non existent...not the golf ball sized super resionious buds I'm used to....between the inconvenient packaging and higher price its not worth getting again.”
“Never had blueberry yum yum but the blueberry delight Dj short is a smooth effective relax mode efficienado.. Enjoy”
